programme.title: Yi Lu Xiang Qian Ep1
programme.desc: The play tells the story of the pioneer company commander Luo Xiangqian who led his soldiers to build roadbeds, resist enemy sabotage, overcome technical and conditional difficulties, open roads over mountains, build bridges when encountering water, move forward without fear of hardship, and thus complete the Chengdu-Chongqing Railway.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep185
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5008
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2274
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3925
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3925

There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep252
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep37
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep319320
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Top Singers (T) Ep645
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep992
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep2425
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says yes. Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Shining for One Thing
programme.desc: Zhang Wan Sen plans to confess his crush on Lin Bei Xing after the college entrance exam, but an accident changes everything tragically. As Zhang feels helpless and devastated, he fortuitously travels back in time with Lin Bei Xing before the accident happens. Can he make amends and convey his regrets this time?

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tangs demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tangs strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Old Fox
programme.desc: In 1989, young Liao Jie and his father save for a home, unaware of rising property prices. Frustrated by poverty, he learns from their landlord Old Fox who teaches him survival in society. Liao Jie ends up hurting Old Fox with what he has learnt, but his empathy prevents him from becoming like Old Fox.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Ultimate Malevolence
programme.desc: The final chapter of 'Tales From The Occult', the movie features three short stories about two high school friends, a magician undergoing hypnosis to find her missing friend, and a man finding his way out of a mysterious building. The stories reveal the most terrifying and ugly side of human nature, where life and death are just a thought away!

programme.title: Hello Stranger
programme.desc: This is a Thai romantic comedy. The story portrays a young Thai man and woman who meet by coincidence while on vacation in South Korea. They decide to tour the country together while keeping their names a secret from each other. From unwillingly at first, then become best friends and fall in love finally.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Ready O/R Rot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi are finally getting married but pressure from Guys mother creates much friction between them. Meanwhile, Grey Bear suspects his wife of cheating on him and Ken faces the biggest crisis of his life when Jessica accidentally gets pregnant. Can they eventually solve their relationship problems?

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: Miao Miao is an awkward young beauty who nevertheless enchants her outgoing classmate Xiao Ai. As Xiao Ais feelings for Miao Miao grows from friendship to something more, Miao Miao discovers her own burgeoning attraction to a sullen CD store owner, and quietly pursues him.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition to live the American dream.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: As It Burns
programme.desc: Detective Wei investigates the death of Yan Zhen in an explosion which seems more than an accident to him. Wei then finds out that Yan Zhen looks a lot like Yin, the girlfriend of Yan Zhens childhood friend Lu, and uncovers a tangled web of deceit leading to surprising revelations when he merges details from the past and the present.

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, Luk uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the governments $15 billion Care Fund. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chans family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chans daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this young auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: The Lovers Blades, a pair of invincible weapons, are to be delivered to the Qing Emperor. However, they accidentally fell into the hands of Xiao Zhong Hui and Yuan Guan Nan, so Imperial Chief Zhuo Tian Xiong hunts them down for the blades. As the battle begins, the secret of the blades are also revealed.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his sons arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bats knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the Full Moon Scimitar, on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This intriguing wuxia saga is packed with conspiracies, power schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres around the struggle for underworld supremacy between two clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clan's fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents' death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wang's exorcist sister (Hsia Ping), who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read May's fortune.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past ten years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep48
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.desc: An anthology of four short stories that describe how films have an influence on the lives of people from various strata of society.

programme.title: Jai Vikraanta
programme.desc: When a poor, honest farmer from rural India is killed by a greedy landlord, his son, Vikraanta, takes a vow to avenge his murder.

programme.title: Karthikeya Mahima
programme.desc: An anthology of stories wherein ardent devotees of Kartikeya, the Hindu god of war, overcome various obstacles and succeed in their lives with the Almighty's help.

programme.title: I Proud To Be An Indian
programme.desc: I, a man from India, travels to London for a family wedding and finds that their community is being threatened by a racist group. Seeing this, he decides to get involved and fight back.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: David and Monty, estranged half-brothers, train in mixed martial arts to earn a livelihood. However, things change when the two are forced to compete against each other in the final tournament.

programme.title: The Bridge On The River Kwai
programme.desc: A highly principled British colonel becomes obsessed with leading a band of P.O.W.s to build a bridge at the behest of their Japanese captors in World War II Burma.

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Forrest Gump, a gentle soul born in a small Alabama town, happens into one memorable experience after another through a panorama of American history from the 1950s to the present.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: An executive flying home for Thanksgiving finds himself seated beside a rowdy salesman. When their flight is rerouted due to a snowstorm, the salesman's advice propels them into one disaster after another.

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: Hollywood's least successful director, Bobby Bowfinger (Steve Martin), attempts to Hollywoods biggest star, Kit Ramsey (Eddie Murphy), for his ultra low-budget film.

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Josh Brolin plays Jonah Hex, a scarred drifter and bounty hunter who can track down anyone...and anything. Having survived death, Jonah's violent history is steeped in myth and legend - leaving him with one foot in the natural world and one on the "other side." His only human connection is with Lilah (Transformers' Megan Fox), whose life in a brothel has left her with scars of her own. But Jonah's past is about to catch up with him when the U.S. military makes him an offer he can't refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must track down and stop the dangerous terrorist Quentin Turnbull (Oscar nominee John Malkovich). But Turnbull, who is gathering an army and preparing to unleash Hell, is also Jonah's oldest enemy and will stop at nothing until Jonah is dead. Based on the legendary graphic novel, this epic adventure thriller gives a new face to the comic book genre by combining the Western genre with supernatural elements.

programme.title: Accused S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Val's Story - Based on the BBC's BAFTA-winning crime anthology, Accused opens in a courtroom on the accused, with viewers knowing nothing about their crime or how they ended up on trial. Told from the defendant's point of view through flashbacks, this series holds a mirror up to the current times with evocative and emotional stories. In Accused, viewers discover how an ordinary person gets caught up in an extraordinary situation, ultimately revealing how one wrong turn leads to another, until it's too late to turn back.

programme.desc: Crunch - A troubled video game designer and her team find themselves in bizarre circumstances which mirror the videogame they have created. Trapped in a toxic building, she must help her colleagues escape. Its no longer a game.

programme.title: Pulse Ep2
programme.desc: Down The Rabbit Hole - Jaz, Errol, Dom and Caspar begin to test the shifting boundaries of their own and others psychosis. Aroundthem, the building assumes a malevolent life of its own.

programme.title: Pulse Ep3
programme.desc: Wonderland - Eddie and Denny engineer another classic game-play staple: A race-against time for a life hanging in thebalance. Jaz determines they will pass that test, win that race, save that life. An unlikely source thinksotherwise.

programme.title: Failure To Launch
programme.desc: A thirty something slacker suspects his parents of setting him up with his dream girl so he'll finally vacate their home.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Draft, Smash Bash - The top 15 chefs are drafted into their three teams; the contestants must prepare an all-American smash burger that proves their cooking abilities.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Curry In A Hurry - The 14 remaining chefs are tasked with preparing a curry dish that promises to pack a punch with only 30 minutes on the clock; the winning dish gives the entire team immunity and claims the top-level kitchen for the next challenge.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S12 Ep39

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S12 Ep34

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S26 Ep4
programme.desc: Constricted - A romantic date ends with a teenager fighting for her life in the hospital; Carisi can't help bringing the case home with him as he envisions the dangers ahead for his growing daughters.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S26 Ep5
programme.desc: Economics Of Shame - When a TV reporter becomes the victim of sextortion that could ruin her career, Benson helps her take back control while Velasco goes undercover as a potential rich target.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S26 Ep6
programme.desc: Roschach - Agent Clay consults with Benson when a woman is found gravely injured at a remote campground and the suspect could be anywhere along the Eastern Seaboard; Bruno and Silva take a chance on an odd hunch to see if it becomes a lead.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S26 Ep7
programme.desc: Tenfold - Bruno must get to the center of a victims incomplete story to track down a serial rapist. Carisi is helpless to stop a crime he suspects is about to be committed.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out Of The Shadows
programme.desc: Now the brothers must team up with April O'Neil and their new ally Casey Jones, to battle their enemies and face their biggest threat: the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Stealth

programme.desc: Find out why islands are like mini-Earths where evolution happens before your eyes. Journey from the Galpagos to Antarctica to see how sea lions, finches, crickets, monkeys and other wildlife are finding surprising solutions to climatic problems.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Cool South Ep2
programme.desc: Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Back to School Ep1
programme.desc: Start a promising new term at the Orangutan Jungle School in Borneo. See newbie Bumi struggle to focus, track skittish Rumbas first timid steps toward independence, and cheer on star student Valentino as he experiences a bumpy start to college.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chico the Baby Capuchin Ep4
programme.desc: In Brazils Serra da Capivara, Chico, the baby capuchin monkey is learning to integrate into a troop with complicated rules, and exploring a forest full of excitement and danger. But mastering the art of tool use holds the key to his survival.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Earth Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to the ends of the Earth, where a drama is unfolding in real time. Meet animals, from tiny butterflies to huge humpback whales, that are acting as sentinels, adapting their behaviour, and helping us unlock the riddles of our changing planet.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Islands Ep2

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Ugly Cute Ep5
programme.desc: Not all baby animals are cute. Often, quirky physical traits are evolutionary adaptations that have helped a species survive. Visit four funny-looking youngsters, including a Baird tapir, two baby gelada baboons, an anteater and a Bactrian camel.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - King Kasper Ep3
programme.desc: Even orangutans have to watch what they eat. Find out if Beni can stick to a leafy green diet (and stop stealing food). See what kind of tasty treats Lanting can find while skipping class. And watch as Rebecca prepares to return to a truly wild life.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - Welcome to the Tundra Ep1
programme.desc: Wake up post-hibernation with 7 ravenous bears as Stage 1 of the competition kicks off. Battle wolves with new mom BoldFace, see tiny Stomper vie for power and Blondies love, and stand back as grizzled vet Bernie brawls with clueless teen Casanova.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - Slammin' Salmon Ep2
programme.desc: Join the frantic dash to cash in on Julys salmon run with the Stage 1 winners and some tough new recruits. Tag along on BigBoi's food-finding road trip, welcome QuadMom and RedBack to the feast, and see if BoldFace can keep her surviving cub safe.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Ravi the Baby Lion Tailed Macaque Ep5
programme.desc: In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Penny, Chunk, and Faith Ep5
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Penny, Chunk, and Faith Ep5
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Primate Families Ep6
programme.desc: The sprawling primate family includes animals as different as monkeys, lemurs and humans. Follow primate babies to see how they bond with their mothers, learn to socialize, and adapt to an ever-changing environment.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 - The Simien Mountains Ep3
programme.desc: Simien Mountains National Park in Ethiopia is home to some of the rarest creatures on earth. Take a glimpse into life on some of the highest peaks in Africa, in the last stronghold of shaggy, grass-grazing Geladas, elusive Simien wolves and horned Walia ibex.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 - The Southern Drylands Ep4
programme.desc: The Southern Drylands is a journey into the most arid and extreme environments in the furthest reaches of southern Africa. We go to spectacular but treacherous places where almost no rain falls, to find incredibly resilient creatures and learn the secrets to their survival. From the largest mammals to the fastest insects and even a ghost-like fish found nowhere else in the world, the Southern Drylands contain some extraordinary inhabitants, all connected by the daily challenges of living in some of most inhospitable habitats in the world.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Carnivores of the Coral Garden Ep1
programme.desc: The seas are alive with carnivores. Meet the sharks and rays who patrol the coral reefs, hunting down their prey. Learn about toxic fish who disguise themselves to ambush the unwary, and armoured predators who devour vulnerable targets.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Magicians of the Reef Ep2
programme.desc: Arabias coral reefs are home to some of natures most impressive illusionists. Creatures can pulsate with colour, transform in the blink of an eye, or perform riveting displays of showmanship. Because in these dangerous waters, disguise is crucial.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Island Feast Ep3
programme.desc: Off the coast of Oman, summer weather drives nutrients in from the ocean depths where they meet the Arabian sun, causing an explosion of life. Smaller fish spawn, filling the waters with eggs. This creates a buffet predators just cant resist.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Defenders of the Reef Ep4
programme.desc: Its summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - A Turtle's Legacy Ep5
programme.desc: The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chinga the Lion Cub Ep2
programme.desc: In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Usana the Cheetah Cub Ep3
programme.desc: Usana, a cheetah cub is born with the odds stacked against her. Few cheetah cubs make it through their first year. Lucky for her, shes got an amazing mother who will stop at nothing to keep her cubs safe. Usana might just follow in her footsteps.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chico the Baby Capuchin Ep4
programme.desc: In Brazils Serra da Capivara, Chico, the baby capuchin monkey is learning to integrate into a troop with complicated rules, and exploring a forest full of excitement and danger. But mastering the art of tool use holds the key to his survival.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Ravi the Baby Lion Tailed Macaque Ep5
programme.desc: In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals 1 - Mum's the Word Ep2
programme.desc: Get to know Fera, the Queen of the Pantanal, as she teaches her rambunctious cub Simba how to climb trees and hunt for dinner. Then learn why Ferinha, another local female, struggles with motherhood as more males move in and threaten the youngsters.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals 1 - Collar Complications Ep3
programme.desc: Rejoin the team for some post-rainy-season drama as they search for Ferinha, Fera, and Badalo, whose tracking collars are missing. Meet a new biologist who helps Lizzie recollar the jaguars, adding a high-tech device that will record even more data.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals 1 - The Queen is Back Ep4
programme.desc: Feel the heat as Lizzie and veterinarian Joares scramble to collar more jaguars amid storms, floods, and power outages. Try to pin down the elusive Badalo before his data-gathering tag drops off and meet a new female the team is eager to study.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 3 - Kimba's Rise Ep1
programme.desc: While the dominant males roam nearby territories, hunting duties fall to the Mwamba prides nine strong lionesses. See how they cope with the approach of the rainy season and six growing teenagers with boundless appetites.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 3 - Prides and Prejudice Ep2
programme.desc: As the lionesses set out to recover the males who are needed to hunt buffalo, they must cross a crocodile-infested river. Follow Milo, the only cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, as hes saved from snapping jaws and cements the familys future.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 3 - The Misfit Comes of Age Ep3
programme.desc: If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.desc: Bristol - Rick eats the ultimate jerk chicken in Bristol and witnesses the healing power of food at a caf staffed by victims of modern slavery. He makes a modern UK favourite, the burrito.

programme.desc: Suffolk - Halfway through his UK food tour, Rick visits a Suffolk bakery making artisan sourdough. He meets an old friend who sells fresh fish on the beach, and back at home, he has a go at making sushi!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep10
programme.desc: Things That Go Bump / Hide Like a Dew Drop - When "something" starts snatching things and causing havoc in Marcus' house, Phoebe and the Dew Drops investigate only to find that it's a stray kitten that they need to catch and find a home for before Marcus returns home. But in the end, Marcus decides to take the kitty in, as his own. / Lola isn't very good at Hide & Seek so the Dew Drops help her improve her game. But she becomes so good that no one can find her! And now shes going to be late to her own surprise tea party!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep4
programme.desc: Crabby / Spe-shell - When Pixies pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallops special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep11
programme.desc: New Tail - D-Structs loses his wrecking ball tail and wants to prove he's still dangerous, but when he gets stuck the crew must decide if they will save him.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep12
programme.desc: Ottos - When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep4
programme.desc: Crabby / Spe-shell - When Pixies pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallops special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky Penny / Hammys Day Out - Marcus has a piano recital and unknowingly forgets his lucky penny at home. Now its up to the Dew Drops to get the penny across town and back into Marcus pocket before showtime. / When Nicholas rolls the hamster ball (with Hammy inside) out into the streets, the Dew Drops must get Hammy back home safely.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep15
programme.desc: Tip's Deep Dish / Garbage Day - When Tip loses her voice, Oh finds a way to use his own voice to talk to her crush Keanu; Oh invents a way to redo yesterday so Tip can redeem a rotten day.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep16
programme.desc: Very Foreign Exchange Student / Pig's Tail - Tip's new friend, the Roidian, stays with the Tuccis in hopes of learning from humans; Tip accidentally swaps bodies with Pig.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep34
programme.desc: Lucky and the Doubtful Drought - When Grayson has the only working well during an unexpected heat wave, Lucky has to find an alternate source of water

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep35
programme.desc: Lucky and the Arabian Nightmares - When Al goes out of town, he puts the PALs in charge of the ramada, but they get more than they bargained for when three trouble-making horses escape

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep36
programme.desc: Lucky and the Fearless Fillies - When the PALs and Snips get caught in a sandstorm, the girls must keep Snips calm and safe

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep60
programme.desc: Sitting Ducks - Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep61
programme.desc: The Big Dumpling - The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep62
programme.desc: The Great Medieval London Fire 1135 - Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep43
programme.desc: The Dragon Knights Part 2 - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep59
programme.desc: My Friend Fifi - Fifi and Bumble fall out in a big way after Fifi doesn't show up to the picnic they are supposed to have together. How strange that Stingo is trying to get them to be friends again, or is it?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep60
programme.desc: Diggly's Big Adventure - Diggly is bored of life on his compost heap and wants to see round the rest of the garden. Fifi offers to give him a guided tour. Diggly gets lost, how will he get home?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep33
programme.desc: The Case Of The Disappearing Rainbow - It's Fable Forest Rainbow Day when the big rainbow in Fable Forest sparkles and pops like a giant firework. Everyone is looking forward to it until the colours start fading from the rainbow! Noddy needs to investigate before the rainbow disappears for good! Revs converts into a helicopter so that Noddy and Bumpy can fly over the rainbow to find the pot of rainbow gold. They discover that Cloppycorn has been taking the gold from the pot to give his unicorn horn a special golden glow. He didn't realise that the gold was the source of the rainbow colours. Noddy persuades Cloppycorn to return the gold to the pot and Rainbow Day goes ahead as planned. Everyone enjoys the gorgeous firework display from the rainbow. Good job, Noddy.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep34
programme.desc: The Case Of The Flying Toy - When Noddy sees Deltoid flying in the air he decides to investigate: how can they get Deltoid down? Realising that magic is involved, Noddy goes to see Queen Sparklewings to see if she can help but she tells him her wand has gone missing. Someone must be trying to do magic with her wand! Meanwhile more flying toys appear, first Fuse and then Smartysaurus. Noddy at last realises that Deltoid, Fuse and Smartysaurus were all in the middle of making a wish when the magic happened and that the culprit is Pat-Pat, who was using Queen Sparklewings' wand to try and make all her friends' wishes come true. Reunited with her wand, Queen Sparklewings is able to bring down the toys. Another successful case for Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep33
programme.desc: Why Ants Work Together - You see there was a time when Ants didn't work together. The Ants desperately wanted to build themselves a home, but all the animals kept sitting on them, or sneezing them far away or swooping them up into tall trees! On the point of giving up, one brave, young soldier ant rallies the troops Pamoja! Together! Together they can do anything!!! and he was right. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep34
programme.desc: Why Flea Jumps - You see there was a time when Flea didn't jump. Flea didn't really move at all. She was very big and very round. All Flea wanted to do was to see the world. The Tinga Tinga animals try to help lift Flea high up, but she is too heavy. Then Tortoise comes up with an idea Movement and activity!' and after many attempts Flea discovers that she can jump. She can jump really high! Then Flea can jump everywhere and see everything.! Tales from Africa.

programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Lunch On!
programme.desc: This episode features the lunches of railway workers, including those of a maintenance crew, a rookie train attendant, a "cat stationmaster," and the technicians on the Doctor Yellow bullet train!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Architect Thomas Rau designed the Dutch Pavilion for the 2025 Expo in Osaka. His Material Passport system tracks material data for reuse, getting global attention for a circular economy innovation.

programme.title: Core Kyoto
programme.desc: Textile producer Shimura Shoji uses plant dyes in the threads for his kimono. Florist Urasawa Mina encourages the enjoyment of flowers. They discuss how their respective fields view and use color.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Evolving Renovations. New approaches use modern tech to reveal and showcase a building's history. From a historic florist to new approaches to office environments, explore renovations.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: In the late 19th century, writer Lafcadio Hearn (Japanese name: Koizumi Yakumo) helped introduce Japan to the wider world. We visit the Izumo area to learn about the supernatural realm that he loved.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline Biz

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1802
programme.desc: Flyweight Contenders - The UFCs Womens Flyweight division has long been ruled by Valentina Shevchenko, but new contenders are on the rise. See Casey ONeill, Andrea Lee, Maycee Barber, and more fight their way toward the top of the 125-pound rankings.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC290MorenovsPantoja2
programme.desc: At UFC 290, Brandon Moreno faced the toughest test of his championship reign in a rematch against Alexandre Pantoja. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their bout on this episode of UFC Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep601OnPointFightinginBrazilOriginsGregoryRodriguesIconsBigNogUltimateAccessVicenteLuque
programme.desc: We delve into the fighting spirit of Brazil and what it means for the UFC stars to fight in their home country. Brazilian sensation Gregory Rodrigues details how hes dedicated his life to fulfilling his fathers dream. UFCs Brazilian fighters share how heavyweight submission specialist Big Nog transformed his division and influenced a generation of Brazilian fighters. Vicente Luque shares how the UFC gave him the means to accomplish his childhood dreams of turning his first car into a racecar.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP MOMENTS GERARD PIQUE
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP MOMENTS GERARD PIQUE - A towering presence at the back and a potent attacking force upfront. Complete domination by Barcelona club captain Gerard Pique.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC298VolkanovskivsTopuria
programme.desc: One of the most dominant champions in UFC history returns to face an undefeated contender, as Alexander Volkanovski travels from his home in Australia to defend his featherweight crown against Spains Ilia Topuria. Plus, former middleweight champ Robert Whittaker vs Paulo Costa, streaking bantamweight Merab Dvalishvili vs former double champion Henry Cejudo, and a whole lot more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep11
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep4
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Figueiredo
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC returns to Macau for the first time in a decade on November 23, and fight fans in China will be treated to a highly anticipated main event as former world champions Petr Yan and Deiveson Figueiredo clash in a five-round battle that could shake up the bantamweight title picture. Brazils Figueiredo has been unstoppable since moving to 135 pounds, but to make his case for a shot at the belt, he must first vanquish Russias No Mercy Yan. Plus, Chinas own Yan Xiaonan makes her first start since her thrilling challenge for the strawweight championship when she takes on fellow 115-pound contender Tabatha Ricci.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Figueiredo

programme.title: UFC 309: Jones vs. Miocic
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to the Worlds Most Famous Arena on Saturday, November 17, as Jon Jones defends his heavyweight title against Stipe Miocic in the highly anticipated main event of UFC 309 at Madison Square Garden in New York City. One of the greatest light heavyweights of all-time, Jones is on his way to repeating that success in his new weight class, but to cement that claim, he has to get by the man considered to be the best heavyweight to ever do it in Clevelands Miocic. Plus, a rematch fans have been waiting for comes to fruition in the Big Apple, as former lightweight champion Charles Oliveira faces off with Iron Michael Chandler.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Figueiredo
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC returns to Macau for the first time in a decade on November 23, and fight fans in China will be treated to a highly anticipated main event as former world champions Petr Yan and Deiveson Figueiredo clash in a five-round battle that could shake up the bantamweight title picture. Brazils Figueiredo has been unstoppable since moving to 135 pounds, but to make his case for a shot at the belt, he must first vanquish Russias No Mercy Yan. Plus, Chinas own Yan Xiaonan makes her first start since her thrilling challenge for the strawweight championship when she takes on fellow 115-pound contender Tabatha Ricci.
